subject: Glyphs and Badges
header: We're already at our fourth edition for this year. January is almost over -- that sound you're hearing is the PR Challenge contestants hurrying to get their patches ready  before February rolls in. In other news, we have some visual candy for you this month: David Farrell brings us some new nifty Perl-themed glyphs, and mdk crafted a badge for all the CPAN testers out there. Enjoy!  ~ `/anick
